snippet: New York Methodist Hospital’s proposed outpatient center would dwarf the surrounding brownstones and cause traffic congestion, some residents say.
abstract: New York Methodist Hospital is embroiled in a battle over its plan to open an outpatient care center next to its main campus in the heart of Park Slope, Brooklyn.
lead_paragraph: New York Methodist Hospital’s proposed outpatient center would dwarf the surrounding brownstones and cause traffic congestion, some residents say.

headline.main: Hospital’s Plan to Expand Angers Many in Park Slope, Brooklyn
headline.print_headline: Hospital Plan to Expand Angers Many in Park Slope
